queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__seminar` ( `id` int(12) NOT NULL auto_increment, `sid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `semnum` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `catid` int(11) NOT NULL default '1', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `target` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `shortdesc` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `description` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `place` text NOT NULL default '', `teacher` varchar(120) NOT NULL default '', `fees` varchar(10) NOT NULL default '0', `maxpupil` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `prebooked` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `bookedpupil` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `stopbooking` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `cancelled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `begin` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `end` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `pubbegin` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `pubend` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `booked` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `showbegin` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '1', `showend` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '1', `showbooked` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '1', `checked_out` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `updated` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `publishdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `publisher` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `access` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `hits` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `grade` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `certificated` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `paid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `gmaploc` varchar(120) NOT NULL default '', `nrbooked` int(5) NOT NULL default '1', `pattern` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `zusatz1` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz2` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz3` text NOT NULL default '', CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__sembookings` ( `id` int(12) NOT NULL auto_increment, `uniqid` text NOT NULL default '', `name` text NOT NULL default '', `email` text NOT NULL default '', `sid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `semid` int(11) NOT NULL default '1', `userid` int(11) NOT NULL default '1', `certificated` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `bookingdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `updated` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `grade` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `comment` varchar(200) NOT NULL default '', `paid` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `paiddate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `nrbooked` int(11) NOT NULL default '1', `zusatz1` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz2` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz3` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz4` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz5` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz6` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz7` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz8` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz9` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz10` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz11` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz12` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz13` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz14` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz15` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz16` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz17` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz18` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz19` text NOT NULL default '', `zusatz20` text NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) COMMENT='Seminar Bookings';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__semattendees` ( `id` int(12) NOT NULL auto_increment, `sembid` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `semid` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `ordering` tinyint(5) NOT NULL default '0', `fees` double NOT NULL default '0', `publishdate` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `request1` text NOT NULL default '', `request2` text NOT NULL default '', `request3` text NOT NULL default '', `request4` text NOT NULL default '', `request5` text NOT NULL default '', `request6` text NOT NULL default '', `request7` text NOT NULL default '', `request8` text NOT NULL default '', `request9` text NOT NULL default '', `request10` text NOT NULL default '', `request11` text NOT NULL default '', `request12` text NOT NULL default '', `request13` text NOT NULL default '', `request14` text NOT NULL default '', `request15` text NOT NULL default '', `request16` text NOT NULL default '', `request17` text NOT NULL default '', `request18` text NOT NULL default '', `request19` text NOT NULL default '', `request20` text NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) COMMENT='Seminar Attendees';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__semlayouts` ( `id` int(12) NOT NULL auto_increment, `chosen` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `overview_event_header` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_nr_of_events` int(3) NOT NULL default '1', `overview_event` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_event_footer` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_booking_header` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_nr_of_bookings` int(3) NOT NULL default '1', `overview_booking` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_booking_footer` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_offer_header` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_nr_of_offers` int(3) NOT NULL default '1', `overview_offer` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `overview_offer_footer` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `event` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `booking` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `booked` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `certificate` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) COMMENT='Seminar Layouts';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__sememails` ( `id` int(12) NOT NULL auto_increment, `chosen` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `new` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `new_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `changed` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `changed_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `unpublished_recent` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `unpublished_recent_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `unpublished_over` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `unpublished_over_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `republished_recent` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `republished_recent_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `republished_over` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `republished_over_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `booked` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `booked_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `bookingchanged` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `bookingchanged_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `canceled` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `canceled_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `paid` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `paid_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `unpaid` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `unpaid_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `certificated` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `certificated_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `uncertificated` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `uncertificated_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) COMMENT='Seminar Emails';
